siragedara yanu ekthara aakarayakata parampara kihipayaka, sanskruthi kihipayaka,samaja kihipayaka, awanithiya, nithiya wisin kotukaranu labu wishama sthanayaki.podieka siragedara enne warade swabhawaya, darunukama pilibanda therumgena nowa hangim walata iwasiya nohaki siduwim daragatha nohaki wime pa්rathipalayak lesaya.namuth siragedarin sudu piruwata anda pitawenne gonamadiththe perasiti podi ekamada yanna gataluwaki.awanithiya namathi kotu wu samajaya thuladi kuda kalaye lada athdakim ratema raja karana bawa ehidi ath dakinnata ehidi hamuwu aya upakara wannata atha.nawatha gamata ena podi eka wikalwu thama mawa balagannata uthsaha karanuye thama mamageda upakara athiwa we.lama kalaye siti podieka saha siragedarin nidahas wu podi eka wenasak nomathiwa perasema gama haduna ganimata uthsaha karanu labayi.podieka siragedara lada athdakim menma gama da athadakim walata muhuna di abhyantharika wenas wim labuwada pitin penunu thaththwaya matha podi eka gama haduna ganimata wehesenu labayi.
